title: Hunt 42 Limitless Gravel Adventure wheels: ultra-endurance race wheels
content:
The Hunt 42 Limitless Gravel Adventure wheelset is an aero gravel wheel that is wide but also has a hooked bead. Hunt is doing it a bit different and targeting the fast endurance crowd, but they could be great for everyone.

Read the full article at Hunt 42 Limitless Gravel Adventure wheels: ultra-endurance race wheels on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
